0.1.name: wordpress/art-direction
0.1.description:
"Per-post styles for new age art direction."

Pay your respects to print, get Art Direction.

This plugin allows you to have global archive and single page per-post styles and scripts.

Need custom CSS everywhere? Try WordPress.com Custom CSS

Notes: * 0.2.4 Brings fixes for issues with caching plugins, support for localization, and the ability to put style-POSTID.css files in your template directory. * As of 0.2.1, global and single page custom code are now inserted in the ! Valid code for everyone! * 0.2 adds role checking and fixes a bug where duplicate global css can occur.
